amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to require the Secretary of Energy to use an index-based pricing bid system when purchasing petroleum products for the SPR.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Estes amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Estes.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Estes amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
